did.abstract: Diary, chiefly from period (Feb. 1844 to Nov. 1845) when Gibbon was off the coast of South America aboard the U.S. naval ship of war Boston while the navy was protecting U.S. interests during the conflict between Uruguay and Argentina. Also daily accounts given during part of the siege at Vera Cruz, Mexico, March 9-14, 1847.
